articles.title: Osaka overtakes Serena to become highest-paid female athlete - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The 22-year-old twice grand slam champion's total of just over $57 million is the most ever earned by a female athlete in a 12-month period.
articles.content: London: Japan's Naomi Osaka has surpassed Serena Williams as the world's highest-paid female athlete, raking in $US37.4 million ($57.3 million) in prizemoney and endorsements over the last year, acco… [+360 chars]
